description: NEO Pattern Library - Historical sweep/correction patterns for training

BULLFLAG_TRAP_DISTRIBUTION.description: What LOOKS like bull flag consolidation is actually distribution top about to dump
BULLFLAG_TRAP_DISTRIBUTION.critical_insight: Volume signature on red candles during consolidation at ATH = distribution, not continuation
signals: Strong uptrend (flagpole) followed by sideways consolidation (looks like flag)
BUT: Volume INCREASES on red candles during consolidation
Two consecutive red candles with rising volume = breakdown starting
Location at ATH or major resistance
Lower highs within the 'flag' (not truly sideways)

volume_signature.real_bull_flag: Volume DECREASES during consolidation, surges UP on green breakout
volume_signature.distribution_top: Volume INCREASES on red candles, surges DOWN on breakdown

detection_rules: Check if red candles show volume increase vs prior green candles
Check if consolidation occurs at ATH or major resistance
Check for two consecutive red candles with rising volume
Check for lower highs within consolidation (not flat)
BULLFLAG_TRAP_DISTRIBUTION.action: CODE ORANGE - Do not add longs, tighten stops immediately

examples.lesson: The two red candles with increasing volume were the tell

ATH_EXHAUSTION_REVERSAL.description: Price at all-time high with exhaustion signals
signals: Multiple failed attempts at new high

LIQUIDITY_SWEEP.description: Quick spike to grab stops, then sharp reversal
signals: Often at round numbers or prior highs
LIQUIDITY_SWEEP.action: Wait for reversal confirmation, then trade with trend

GAP_AND_TRAP.description: Gap open that traps traders, then reverses
GAP_AND_TRAP.action: Fade the gap after first hour if no follow-through

examples.note: Stop hunt completed, gap partially filled

TREND_EXHAUSTION.description: Extended trend showing signs of fatigue
signals: Lower highs forming on shorter timeframes

NEWS_WHIPSAW.description: Violent moves around major news events
NEWS_WHIPSAW.action: Reduce size before event, widen stops, or stay flat

FALSE_BREAKOUT.action: Trade the reversal with tight stop above/below false break
